name: Borderlight
description:
Welcome to Borderlight!



Borderlight is a 2D colonist simulator with an emphasis on resources. Gather, import, and sell various resources or use them to construct buildings. Acquire settlers and assign them jobs. Level up and assign points to further increase resource incomes. Fight zombies, or lose resources trying.

Includes 36 engaging achievements!

Features:

  • Gather, import, and sell resources.
  • Construct various buildings (Bank, Castle, House, Mine, Pyramid, Tower).
  • Acquire settlers.
  • Assign jobs to settlers (Farmer, Logger, Miner).
  • Level up and assign level points.
  • Fight zombies.
